name: Universal Dev Container with Claude Code
description: Production-ready development environment with Claude Code AI assistant, network firewall, and proxy support

claudeLoginMethod.description: How to authenticate Claude Code: 'host' copies from ~/.claude (recommended), 'api-key' uses ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env var, 'manual' requires you to login manually after container starts

enableFirewall.description: Enable whitelist-based outbound firewall (blocks all non-whitelisted egress traffic). Requires NET_ADMIN capability.

strictProxyMode.description: If true, forces ALL outbound traffic through HTTP_PROXY (no direct HTTPS to allowlisted domains). Only enable if you have a corporate proxy.

timezone.description: Container timezone (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/London', 'Asia/Shanghai'). Uses TZ environment variable.

enableSandbox.description: Enable Claude Code sandbox mode (restricts command execution). Recommended for untrusted repositories.

bypassPermissions.description: Enable Claude Code bypass permissions mode (auto-approve read/write operations). ONLY use with trusted repositories!
